definition: to drag/to tow/to trail/to hang down/to mop (the floor)/to delay/to drag on
to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)

sentences.english: The American truck had already been towed away.
sentences.chinese: 那辆美军卡车已经被拖走了。

sentences.english: Any illegally parked vehicles would be towed away.
sentences.chinese: 所有非法泊车的车辆将被拖走。

sentences.english: Eventually the heirs pay the yard to have it towed off and junked.
sentences.chinese: 最后继承旧船的人还得付钱给船厂把它们拖走和废弃。

sentences.english: If I was wrong, my car would be towed.
sentences.chinese: 如果停错了我的车将会被拖走。

sentences.english: I could not ask them to discard all the dishes and take away the table.
sentences.chinese: 我不能让他们拆下一桌的饭菜，把桌子拖走。

sentences.english: They dragged the fallen tree clear of the road.
sentences.chinese: 他们把倒下的树从路上拖走。

sentences.english: The disabled vehicles obstructed traffic until removed by a tow truck.
sentences.chinese: 抛锚的车子直到被拖车拖走后才不阻碍交通。

sentences.english: The old ship was towed away to be broken up and sold as scrap.
sentences.chinese: 那艘旧船被拖走以便拆散当废铁卖了。

sentences.english: She grabbed the boy and dragged him away.
sentences.chinese: 她抓住男孩，把他拖走了。

sentences.english: Why don't you hook this pool up to your Ferrari and drag it out of here?
sentences.chinese: 那你为什么不把这泳池挂在你的法拉利后面拖走呢？

sentences.english: In the villages we hear stories of infants and livestock snatched by predators.
sentences.chinese: 我们在这里就听到了有婴儿和牲畜被野兽拖走的事情。

sentences.english: What con I do if my car gets towed?
sentences.chinese: 有何补救之策挽回被拖走的车？

sentences.english: The ionosphere is basically dragged away.
Here's an update of what I got done the other day with the tail pipe for the towed array.
sentences.chinese: 这里的更新什么样的我做了其他天与尾管为拖走阵列。

sentences.english: Mui Koo stretched out her arm, but no use.
sentences.chinese: 梅姑伸出了手臂，可女歌迷还是被硬生生拖走了。

sentences.english: The tug boat will tow the ship away for the safety of the port in case of emergency.
sentences.chinese: 再紧急状况下可以让拖轮将舟拖走，保证港口安全。

definition: to go (of car, train etc)/to drive off
to knock down/to knock over/to run over (sb)
to swagger off/to walk off (or drive off etc) without a second thought for those left behind
to bind a person's upper body, with arms tied behind the back and rope looped around the neck/to truss up
to knock down and kill sb with a car/to run over sb/to run sb down
to drive (vehicle)/to drive out/to chase away/to herd (people towards a gate)
to steer (the plane) away from/to drive away (from a place)/to leave
